original: apply Nat2Z.inj. rewrite A_is_sum. rewrite A_is_sum. simpl. assert (H : α (1 + m) = α m + α (S m) - α (S m)). { lia. } rewrite H at 2. rewrite <- Z.add_sub_assoc. f_equal. rewrite <- Z.sub_add_distr. f_equal. symmetry. rewrite <- Nat2Z.inj_add. rewrite <- Nat2Z.inj_add. rewrite Hv. rewrite Z.sub_add. reflexivity.
